meanings.definition: Chemical compounds found in chili peppers that cause a burning sensation.

meanings.sent3: The capsaicins in the salsa were on fire!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like capsaicins, burning through his defenses.
meanings.sent5: The capsaicins painted a fiery picture on my taste buds.
